article_title: AI in Healthcare: Transforming Patient Care

impacts.impact: Improved diagnosis accuracy through AI-powered analysis of medical images and patient data

supporting_evidence.description: AI algorithms can analyze medical images with 95% accuracy, reducing misdiagnosis rates

impacts.impact: Increased operational efficiency through automated administrative tasks and patient scheduling

supporting_evidence.description: AI-powered scheduling systems reduced administrative workload by 40% in pilot hospitals

impacts.impact: Accelerated drug discovery and clinical trial analysis through AI-driven data processing

supporting_evidence.description: AI models identified potential drug candidates 50% faster than traditional methods
